protocol.name: P-GSE35507-1
protocol.text: GeneChip intensities were background-corrected, normalized and sumarized by MAS5 suite (Affymetrix) ID_REF =  VALUE = Normalized Signal values as calculated by MAS5 (TGT=250)

protocol.name: P-GSE35507-2
protocol.text: Seeds of csb3 mutant and wild-type Arabidopsis thaliana were kept at 4°C for 3 days and sown in jiffy7 peat pellets (Clause-Tezier Ibérica, Paterna, Spain). Plants were grown in a growth phytochamber for 5 weeks with a light intensity of approximately 150-200 µE m-2s-1 at 23°C under 10 h light/14 h dark cycles and 60% humidity.

protocol.name: P-GSE35507-3
protocol.text: RNA was isolated with Tri-Reagent (Invitrogen) following manufacture´s instructions. High-quality RNA was obtained by using RNeasy Plant Mini Kit (Qiagen).

protocol.name: P-GSE35507-4
protocol.text: Biotinylated cRNA was prepared according to the standard Affymetrix protocol from 4 µg total RNA (Expression Analysis Technical Manual, 2001, Affymetrix).

protocol.name: P-GSE35507-5
protocol.text: Following fragmentation, 10 µg of biotinylated cRNA were hybridized to Affymetrix chips (Arabidopsis ATH1 Genome Array). Each sample was added to a hybridization solution containing 100mM 2-(N-morpholino)ethanesulfonic acid, 1 M Na+, and 20mM of EDTA in the presence of 0.01% of Tween-20 to a final cRNA concentration of 0.05 µg/ml. Hybridization was performed for 16 h at 45ºC . Each microarray was washed and stained with streptavidin-phycoerythrin in a Fluidics station 450 (Affymetrix).

protocol.name: P-GSE35507-6
protocol.text: GeneChips were scanned using the standard Affymetrix GeneChip Scanner
